name: World of Outlaws: Sprint Cars (2002)
description: Hit speeds in excess of 170mph, powerslide around tight ovals, and strive for the top spot in World of Outlaws: Sprint Cars. You can race as one of 24 drivers in single races, a championship season, or an entire career. In multiplayer mode, you can put your driving skills to the test against nine other people through a local network or the Internet. The game also boasts realistic physics, tracks, and damage modeling.
